  "title": "Property Manager",
  "description": "Ajoke Group is a distribution company that deals with the supply of major FMCG&#39;s products nationwide.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Property Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Manage all aspects of assigned properties
	Design business plans for assigned properties that suit customers&rsquo; needs
	Inspect and arrange maintenance to meet standards
	Maintain a positive, productive relationship with tenants
	Negotiate lease/contracts with contractors in a timely and reliable manner
	Advertise and market vacant spaces to attract tenants
	Collect receivable accounts and handle operating expenses
	Develop and manage annual budgets by forecasting requirements and analyzing variances, data and trends
	Oversee properties&rsquo; personnel and assess its performance
	Accomplish financial goals and report periodically on financial performance
	Source and build relationships with prospective clients to expand business opportunities
	Update job and market knowledge


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor Degree / Master Degree with 2-3 years of work experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment.asl@yahoo.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Property Manager Job at Ajoke Group




        
    

        
        Ajoke Group is a distribution company that deals with the supply of major FMCG's products nationwide.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Property Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage all aspects of assigned properties
	Design business plans for assigned properties that suit customers’ needs
	Inspect and arrange maintenance to meet standards
	Maintain a positive, productive relationship with tenants
	Negotiate lease/contracts with contractors in a timely and reliable manner
	Advertise and market vacant spaces to attract tenants
	Collect receivable accounts and handle operating expenses
	Develop and manage annual budgets by forecasting requirements and analyzing variances, data and trends
	Oversee properties’ personnel and assess its performance
	Accomplish financial goals and report periodically on financial performance
	Source and build relationships with prospective clients to expand business opportunities
	Update job and market knowledge


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor Degree / Master Degree with 2-3 years of work experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment.asl@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Graphics Designer",
  "description": "Snapnet, a leading technology consulting firm and certified partner of Microsoft, AWS, Oracle, Huawei, and other global OEMs. Snapnet is an ICT Consulting firm with strategic focus in developing Industry specific solutions, Business consulting and Systems Integration with offices in Lagos and Abuja, Nigeria. We are committed to delivering first class innovation, quality, and state of the art technology solutions to discerning clients both in the private and public sector.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphics Designer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Graphics Artist with a strong portfolio and a minimum of two years&rsquo; experience to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will play a key role in enhancing the company&rsquo;s brand identity across digital and print platforms.
	You will work closely with marketing, content, and product teams to create compelling visuals that align with our brand voice and drive audience engagement.


Key Responsibilities


	Design and develop visual content for digital campaigns, social media, websites, email marketing, product branding, and presentations.
	Create and maintain consistent brand assets, templates, and visual guidelines.
	Collaborate with marketing and communications teams to translate messaging into strong, impactful visuals.
	Work on promotional materials such as brochures, flyers, banners, and corporate documents.
	Develop creative concepts and graphics for events, internal communications, and client-facing content.
	Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in design, branding, and marketing.
	Manage multiple projects and meet deadlines while maintaining high-quality standards.
	Provide design support for video content and animations where applicable.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Graphic Design, Fine Arts, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of proven experience as a Graphics Designer/Artist in a branding, marketing, or creative environment.
	Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects is a plus).
	Strong understanding of visual composition, layout, typography, and color theory.
	A strong portfolio showcasing branding and marketing-focused design work.
	Ability to interpret briefs and translate ideas into compelling visuals.
	Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
	Self-motivated, adaptable, and able to take feedback constructively.


Preferred:


	Experience working with corporate or tech brands.
	Familiarity with UI/UX concepts or basic web design is an added advantage.
	Basic animation or video editing skills.


What We Offer


	A creative and collaborative work environment.
	Opportunities to work on impactful branding and marketing campaigns.
	Room for professional development and career growth.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send your CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@snapnetsolutions.com&nbsp;using &quot;Graphics Designer&quot; as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;Please attach the link to the portfolio containing your previous work.",

  "validThrough": "2025-08-14",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Snapnet Limited"
    
  },

Graphics Designer Job at Snapnet Limited




        
    

        
        Snapnet, a leading technology consulting firm and certified partner of Microsoft, AWS, Oracle, Huawei, and other global OEMs. Snapnet is an ICT Consulting firm with strategic focus in developing Industry specific solutions, Business consulting and Systems Integration with offices in Lagos and Abuja, Nigeria. We are committed to delivering first class innovation, quality, and state of the art technology solutions to discerning clients both in the private and public sector.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphics Designer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Graphics Artist with a strong portfolio and a minimum of two years’ experience to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will play a key role in enhancing the company’s brand identity across digital and print platforms.
	You will work closely with marketing, content, and product teams to create compelling visuals that align with our brand voice and drive audience engagement.


Key Responsibilities


	Design and develop visual content for digital campaigns, social media, websites, email marketing, product branding, and presentations.
	Create and maintain consistent brand assets, templates, and visual guidelines.
	Collaborate with marketing and communications teams to translate messaging into strong, impactful visuals.
	Work on promotional materials such as brochures, flyers, banners, and corporate documents.
	Develop creative concepts and graphics for events, internal communications, and client-facing content.
	Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in design, branding, and marketing.
	Manage multiple projects and meet deadlines while maintaining high-quality standards.
	Provide design support for video content and animations where applicable.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Graphic Design, Fine Arts, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of proven experience as a Graphics Designer/Artist in a branding, marketing, or creative environment.
	Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects is a plus).
	Strong understanding of visual composition, layout, typography, and color theory.
	A strong portfolio showcasing branding and marketing-focused design work.
	Ability to interpret briefs and translate ideas into compelling visuals.
	Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
	Self-motivated, adaptable, and able to take feedback constructively.


Preferred:


	Experience working with corporate or tech brands.
	Familiarity with UI/UX concepts or basic web design is an added advantage.
	Basic animation or video editing skills.


What We Offer


	A creative and collaborative work environment.
	Opportunities to work on impactful branding and marketing campaigns.
	Room for professional development and career growth.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send your CV to: recruitment@snapnetsolutions.com using "Graphics Designer" as the subject of the email.

Note: Please attach the link to the portfolio containing your previous work.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
